content.question: Unlike Marx, Lenin emphasized that

choices.label: revolution is not necessary for the triumph of communism
the peasantry rather than the proletariat would lead the communist revolution
the elimination of private control of the means of production is necessary to bring about a socialist society
the working class, on its own, would not develop revolutionary consciousness
communist cooperation with liberal political parties is necessary to bring about socialism

content.answer: the working class, on its own, would not develop revolutionary consciousness

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
